name: Fuzzy Runners
description:
Fuzzy Runners

A fast-paced runner type 2D game for Android mobile OS developed by Aioni Games.

Game centers around wacky game play with one-tap mechanics and tactical thinking. The trick to winning is to set up traps for the opponent to secure your victory. Winning gains more traps to be used in the following runs. Prizes also include accessories and options to customize your own fuzzy avatar.

FeaturesRacing

Race 1vs1 against a random online opponent. Increase your score with a streak of wins and climb your way to the top of the ranked league system.

Tactical with Traps

Mine the racetrack for your opponent, choosing from dozen and more traps. Collect them all and upgrade for maximum effect.

Customize with Outfits

Get your own customizable Fuzzy avatar. There are plenty of new outfits to collect to suit your tastes.
